channel.title: Cobrahost vps
channel.description:
I downloaded java , opened port 43594 on firewall , i ran my source on vps , i went to my pc , changed ip of client to Vps ip , my client loads , but when i try to login it says error connecting to server , why is this ? i am using Eclipse 639
Greetz eson

item.title: Cobrahost vps
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

Turn off your firewall

Read full topic

item.title: Cobrahost vps
item.dc:creator: @qtst35 qtst35
item.description:
@qtst35 wrote:

[quote=“ultimatepkvillage, post:2, topic:429168”]Q: Why is this?
A: you changed your client ip to your vps ip, instead of using 127.0.0.1[/quote]

what good would that do if the vps isnt his computers local host thats like saying if i wanted to connect to his server i cud just change my client ip to 127.0.0.1 and wola…

Read full topic
